idea-plugin.name: Base16 Gruvbox light, hard
idea-plugin.vendor: Dawid Kurek (dawikur@gmail.com), morhetz (https://github.com/morhetz/gruvbox), Shirom Makkad, and the Base16 project
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Gruvbox light, hard for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Dawid Kurek (dawikur@gmail.com), morhetz (https://github.com/morhetz/gruvbox). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
